optionContent.option: Agree to the work, swear David to secrecy, and complete the work together before leaving.
Tell David to do the work if he wants to, but that he won’t be involved.
Politely explain to the client that they can’t accept, since that would take business away from Johnson Controls.

incorrect.text: Carlos and David complete the work before leaving. It’s easy! And they always carry a few spare sensors so Johnson Controls won’t be any the wiser.

partial.text: David agrees to take on the work on the side.

correct.text: Carlos calls his manager, who lets the sales team know, and they sort out a quote for the additional work. The work goes to Johnson Controls, rather than being diverted to Carlos or David personally.
